attributes.action:
Send troops to protect HongKonger/BNO
Give BNO holders/anyone born before1997BC
attributes.additional_details: 831till920,28 people “suicide”,some on the sea (one with hands tied up with bricks),some hung themselves in some rural area(without ladder found), some “fell from highrise”(without sound&blood & skin already turned black).HKPF said“no suspicious circumstances” for ALL of them.We found our lives threatened by HKPF as well as triad.When title British National(oversea) was given to HongKonger,you took up the responsibility for our safety. Now it's time for your to take it up.Brexit is no excuse.
attributes.background: Law Enforcer HKPF break the law,who can we call?To protect ourselves from random expired tear gas w/ cyanide,we buy respiratory masks for family,but we would be arrested for suspicious to attend illegal assembly.A girl was even arrested for illegal assembly on her own walking on the street.
